channel.title: Graph on ownCloud
channel.description: Recent content in Graph on ownCloud

item.title: Spaces
item.description: Graph Service Spaces API Methods Examples Starting conditions Graph Service The Graph service is a reference implementation of the MS Graph API. There are no libraries doing any work only a set of routes and handlers. Spaces API The Spaces API makes use of the MS Graph API Drive resource to represent the concept of a Storage Space.

item.title: Users
item.description: Users API Reading users GET /me GET /users GET /users/{userid or accountname} Creating / Updating Users POST /users Request Body Response DELETE /users/{id} PATCH /users/{id} Users API The Users API is implementing a subset of the functionality of the MS Graph User resource The JSON representation of a User handled by the Users API looks like this:

item.title: Groups
item.description: Groups API Reading groups GET /groups GET /groups/{groupid} Getting Group Members GET /groups/{groupid}/members Creating / Updating Groups POST /groups Request Body Response DELETE /groups/{id} PATCH /groups/{id} Adding a single member to a group POST /groups/{id}/members/$ref Adding multiple members in a single request PATCH /groups/{id} Removing a member DELETE /groups/{groupid}/members/{id}/$ref Groups API The Groups API is implementing a subset of the functionality of the MS Graph Group resource The JSON representation of a Group as handled by the Groups API looks like this:
